tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor suggestions were really helpful. He is very good at analysing the issue and suggesting solutions

Dr. J Gopala Krishna sir is very kind person and very humble doctor. I genuinely recommend him. I was suffering with severe tinea infection (ringworms) and with lot pain, & irritation and burning sensation with continuous itchy feeling, & spent very uncomfortable days. Through Practo, I got free consultation from Doctor sir *** ** *** * ******* *** ************* *** ********* ***** ** *** ****** **** ***** *** I am almost free from the painful & stubborn ringworms. A big thank you to Doctor sir and his amazing knowledge & experience that he holds. Keep up the best work sir, truly proud of you.

Dr.krishna was very friendly, he listened to my concerns and explained them very patiently.
He suggested lifestyle changes and ways to cope with stress.
Hats off to his memory. He remembered my vitamin-D numbers of three tests which i showed him in my first visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He was very patient and understanding when I explained him about the problem. Gave me good insights about the reasons for the medical issue. He even to took time out of his busy schedule to check up on me even after 2-3 days of the general checkup. Professional & good. Would definitely recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. J Gopala krishna sir is a phenominal and extremly friendly person.He is most dynamic and gets to the heart of the problem to cure it. He listens to the problem with great patience and give proper advice and treatment to get rid of it.i will subscrible to the dr. Consulation for any tretment in future.

A very soft spoken doctor who listens patiently and gives sound and correct advice. I consulted him when I contracted covid and found him to be the best amongst 2 other doctors I was referring to. After speaking to him, it convinced me not to go back to the other docs for reference at all.
Highly recommended!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctor is very nice and humble. He listened my concerns very carefully and the diagnosis was bang on. I reached out to him as I had loose stools for 10 days continuously. Doctor asked for serum electrolytes  test and my potassium came out to be high. After seeing the reports, first question he asked if I take coconut water frequently. And true I was taking it for last 15days. Doctor asked to stop it right away and repeat the test. I did the same and my potassium levels are normal now and symptoms improved. 
Consulting the doctor Gopalakrishna has been a great experience for me and happy to share my happy story.
Thank you Sir!
